special_text:
Whenever a nontoken creature you control dies, you may exile it. If you do, put a loyalty counter on Alessa.
[+1]: Exile up to one target creature with power 3 or less. You gain life equal to its power.
[-3]: Put target creature card you own exiled with Alessa onto the battlefield.
[-7]: You get an emblem with “Whenever a nonland permanent you control enters, you may exile another target nonland permanent.”
